question: 劣る
sourceMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an <ja>う</ja> sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>inferiority</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to be inferior to</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: When thinking about cars, an <reading>auto</reading>matic (<ja>おと</ja>) car is inferior to a manual car. Sure, manual is harder, but way more interesting to drive.
